dataTemplate.name: NVO_ITEMS_EXPIRED_PROD_CLASS
dataTemplate.description: NVO Items With Expired Product Classification

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT itm.item_xid item_id, itm.description, gic.gtm_prod_class_type_gid class_type_id, itm.item_name, glog_util.remove_domain(itm.commodity_gid) commodity_id, TO_CHAR((SELECT gdv.source_date FROM gtm_data_version gdv WHERE gdv.gtm_data_version_gid = (SELECT gpcc.gtm_data_version_gid FROM gtm_prod_class_code gpcc WHERE gpcc.gtm_prod_class_code_gid = gic.gtm_prod_class_code_gid)),'MM/DD/YYYY') expired_on FROM item itm INNER JOIN gtm_item_classification gic ON itm.item_gid = gic.gtm_item_gid WHERE gic.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND gic.classification_status = 'Classification Invalid' ORDER BY TO_DATE(expired_on,'MM/DD/YYYY')
